name: phonebook-backend
description: This is the backend for the phonebook application

scripts.build:ui: cd ../../part2/phonebook && npm install && npm run build && cp -rf build ../../part3/phonebook-backend
scripts.deploy: git checkout feature/phonebook-render && git merge --no-ff -m 'Deploy to Prod' feature/phonebook-backend && git push

author: Alex Grau
